name: Pub
description: An establishment offering food, drink, or lodging; adventurers can rest, meet informants, or overhear tavern talk.
atmosphere: The pub has a warm, convivial atmosphere with the rich scent of ale and the sound of lively conversation and laughter. The air carries the promise of community and the essential nature of social gathering, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of shared stories and the comfort of familiar surroundings.
